exceptions.exn: In environment A, X : Type TX : reduction_t A X F := Comp (chaining_l (expand TX TX)) (chaining_r (bisim TX TX)) : relation2 X X -> relation2 X X G := Comp (star (X:=X)) (Union2 (identity (Y:=X)) (constant (bisim TX TX))) : relation2 X X -> relation2 X X Unable to unify "wmonotonic ?M1511 ?M1511 ?M1513" with "X -> X -> Prop".

In environment H : forall (A X : Type) (TX : reduction_t A X) (F G : function X X), wmonotonic TX TX F -> wmonotonic TX TX G -> wmonotonic TX TX (Chain F G) A, X : Type TX : reduction_t A X R : relation2 X X Unable to unify "Prop" with "incl (Comp (chaining_l (expand TX TX)) (chaining_r (bisim TX TX)) R) (Comp (star (X:=X)) (Union2 (identity (Y:=X)) (constant (bisim TX TX))) R)".

original: unfold contains. apply Chaining_wmon. apply wexpand.
